summary: Removed useless perks, add a new one and rebalance the perk position to make Lockpicking tree more attractive.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b]Description:[/b][/color]
If you don't like mods that drastically change vanilla, but also think that vanilla lockpicking tree is useless and unattractive then this mod it's definitely for you.
I have just change some perk orders, removed all useless perks, and added 1 perk that fortify lockpicking.



[color=yellow][b]Basic:[/b][/color]

-Lockpicking tree is now less demanding. It has 6 perks (down from 11).
-Tree's structure has been reconfigured to make interesting perks more accesible.
-Useless [color=green]Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert and Master Locks[/color] perks are gone.
-1 new perk called [color=green]Unlocker[/color] gives you a 15% fortify lockpicking bonus.
-Unlocker is now the only required perk for others.
-[color=green]Quick hands[/color]: unchanged except for required perk.
-[color=green]Wax key[/color]: increased skill level required from 50 to 70
-[color=green]Golden touch[/color]: decreased skill level required from 60 to 40.
-[color=green]Treasure hunter[/color]: unchanged.
-[color=green]Locksmith and Unbreakable[/color]: merged into [color=green]Locksmith[/color], skill level required is pretty low compared to both vanilla perks (50 down from 80/90).


[color=yellow][b]Advanced:[/b][/color]

-Advanced version of the mod, provides another new perk called [color=green]Lockpicking Master[/color], which gives you a 35% fortify lockpicking bonus. This perk requires Wax key, Locksmith and Treasure hunter perks. The reason of this perk is to have a reward if player fills the entire tree and reach level 100 in lockpicking.
-In addiction Unbreakable feature has been removed from Locksmith perk. I thought that Skeleton key artifact must be special as intended.


[color=yellow][b]Suggested mods:[/b][/color]

I highly reccomend to use this mods in addiction with Simplified Lockpicking Tree:

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28034]Lockpick weight fixed[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6594/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D6594]Lockpick graduation[/url]
-A craftable lockpick mod like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/885/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D885&pUp=1]Craftable Lockpicks[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11540/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D11540]Less lockpicks[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22950/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D22950]Lockpicking overhaul[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29979/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D29979]Lock overhaul[/url]
